text:
South 4th Street, south side, east from Washington Plaza. At the right foreground, is a playground located in the Plaza. The buildings in the background, are at Havemeyer Street, east side, between South 4th and South 5th Streets. At the right background, is the Dime Savings Bank of Williamsburg.

August 9, 1935.

P. L. Sperr.
title: Brooklyn: 4th Street (South) - Washington Plaza
